name: Harrow Hound
languages: understands Sylvan but can't speak it

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hound has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally doesn't have the {@condition incapacitated} condition.

traits.name: Supernatural Tracker
entries: The hound knows the distance to and direction of any creature that has come within 30 feet of it, even if that creature is on a different plane of existence. If the creature being tracked by the hound dies, the hound knows.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have the {@condition prone} condition.
